posts.post_content:
"Instant Win" mid-game in a Blue / Black Deck:  
  
1. Don't play your land for the turn.  
2. Cast Upheaval.  
3. Play a Swamp, tap, [Dark Ritual](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dark Ritual ) -> [Megrim](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Megrim ) / [Liliana's Caress](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Liliana's Caress).  
  
If your opponent has 20 life, making them discard 10 cards (shouldn't be difficult at all by that point in the the game) will win you the game as soon as their clean up step comes. Just hope they're not playing W, or else it's Plains, tap, [Demystify](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Demystify ) for you! xD
posts.html:
"Instant Win" mid-game in a Blue / Black Deck:

1. Don't play your land for the turn.
2. Cast Upheaval.
3. Play a Swamp, tap, Dark Ritual -> Megrim / Liliana's Caress.

If your opponent has 20 life, making them discard 10 cards (shouldn't be difficult at all by that point in the the game) will win you the game as soon as their clean up step comes. Just hope they're not playing W, or else it's Plains, tap, Demystify for you! xD

Posted By: EvilCowKing (1/6/2012 2:57:22 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
This card is amazing in madness decks. If it resolves, you are probably going to win.   
  
You can use any floating mana to replay your [Wild Mongrel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wild Mongrel), and you can discard your [Basking Rootwalla](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Basking Rootwalla) into play at the end of turn. If you have those two cards out and your opponent has no permanents in play, they might as well just scoop.
posts.html:
This card is amazing in madness decks. If it resolves, you are probably going to win.

You can use any floating mana to replay your Wild Mongrel, and you can discard your Basking Rootwalla into play at the end of turn. If you have those two cards out and your opponent has no permanents in play, they might as well just scoop.
